message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $165?
I'm getting closer to my budget, but I still need to save some money. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
I can see you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $155?
I'm really close to my budget, but I still need to make it work. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
I can see you're really serious about getting the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more significant concession. How about we meet at $160?
I'm really trying to make this work, but $160 is still a bit too high. Would you be willing to meet me at a price that's closer to my budget?
I can see you're really committed to getting the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. How about we meet at $157.50?
I'm really close to my limit, but I'm willing to make one last push. Would you be willing to meet me at a price that's within my budget?
